lead_paragraph: Daniel Murphy, who had been expected to be the starter at first base, is out two to six weeks with a knee injury.
snippet: Daniel Murphy, who had been expected to be the starter at first base, is out two to six weeks with a knee injury.

headline.main: Mets’ Murphy Will Miss Opener With a Knee Injury
headline.seo: Mets’ Murphy Will Miss Opener With Knee Injury
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Murphy Will Miss Opener With a Knee Injury
